overview: We never had a kid!  But now we have a kind and she is dead!  An old couple is naming a baby while outside their private life is congestion around the river; a kid has been drowned.  Adapted from the story Entrusted to Earth  From the book Cheetahs That Ran With Me  By Bizhan Najdi  The Copyright of this film has been registered upon  the permit and under the contract of Nashre Markaz
title: Deposit to the Ground
